metadata.title: Pink Blue Paisley Hearts Silk Pocket Square
features: 100% Silk Twill Pink Blue Paisley Hearts Silk Pocket Square
Excellent for Weddings, Business Attire, Cocktail Parties, and Formal Events
description: 100% silk twill pink blue paisley hearts pocket square with amazing zigzag stitching. Measures 12" x 12" (30 x 30cm). Simple and classy, it's the perfect stylish pocket square for every day business, professional attire, formal events, concerts, balls, weddings and parties.
metadata.details: {"Is Discontinued By Manufacturer": "No", "Package Dimensions": "7.09 x 6.06 x 0.24 inches; 0.35 Ounces", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "December 11, 2018"}
